Class MoveChangeAbilityAttack

java.lang.Object

Direct Known Subclasses:
AbsorbAbyAtk, AbsorbAbyAtk2, AbyCutAtk
public abstract class MoveChangeAbilityAttack
extends MoveNormal

Move that changes or absorbs ability in addition to normal attack
